job_details.Functieomschrijving: ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of several Global Analytics Centre of Excellences around the bank's key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence, and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships., Specifically, you will help creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Dialogue Analytics. You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization. You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.
job_details.full_text:
MLOps cloud solution engineer

ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of several Global Analytics Centre of Excellences around the bank's key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence, and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships., Specifically, you will help creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Dialogue Analytics. You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization. You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on MLOps and cloud solutions engineering within a banking context, but lacks specific details about core AI/ML tasks like model development or generative AI applications. It appears to be more infrastructure and operations-focused rather than a direct AI/ML engineering role.

phrases: ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond.

The team consists of several Global Analytics Centre of Excellences around the bank's key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence, and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships.
Specifically, you will help creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Dialogue Analytics.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the role's connection to business goals, understanding the banking sector's needs, and aligning technical solutions with business capabilities like Customer Dialogue Analytics.
The title 'cloud solution engineer' and the mention of 'creating solutions' imply software development aspects, particularly in building and deploying systems.

phrases: implement these solutions across the organization
job_tasks.justification: The explicit mention of 'MLOps' in the title and the responsibility to 'implement solutions across the organization' directly point to operational and deployment aspects of AI/ML systems.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.
proactively work with teams to implement these solutions
